At level 9, Arcane Tricksters learn Magical Ambush. While hidden, Arcane Trickster targets have Disadvantage on Saving Throws against their Spells. Warped Headband of Intellect, which can be found very early on in the Blighted Village, can be extremely useful for Arcane Tricksters.
